flows.name: OOB Content - Twitter Zero Day Monitoring

nodes.name: Twitter
nodes.description: Search twitter for potential zerodays using the following criteria: Contains CVE-YYYY-, has configurable retweets and configurable likes.
nodes.title: Get Latest Tweets

modules.name: Get_Twitter_Zero_Days
modules.description: Search twitter for potential zerodays using the following criteria: Contains CVE-YYYY-, has configurable retweets and configurable likes.

templateNodes.name: Get_Variables
templateNodes.templateLQL:
select 
"%%%bearer_token%%%" as bearer_token,
%%%num_retweets%%% as num_retweets,
%%%num_likes%%% as num_likes,
date_format(current_timestamp(),'y') as current_year,
date_format(from_utc_timestamp(current_timestamp(), 'America/Chicago'),'HH') as current_hour
 from %%%parent0%%%

templateNodes.name: Get_Tweet_Metrics
templateNodes.templateLQL:
`select get_json_object(referenced_tweets, "$[0].id") as referenced_tweet_id,author_id,id, get_json_object(public_metrics, "$.retweet_count") as rt_cnt,
get_json_object(public_metrics, "$.like_count") as like_cnt,public_metrics,text, num_likes, num_retweets from operator_runScript`

templateNodes.name: Extract_Top_Tweet_IDs
templateNodes.templateLQL: `select referenced_tweet_id from Get_Tweet_Metrics where (rt_cnt >= num_retweets) AND (like_cnt >= num_likes) group by referenced_tweet_id`

templateNodes.name: Get_Rid_of_Duplicate_Columns
templateNodes.templateLQL: [  SELECT id AS tweet_id, get_json_object(public_metrics, "$.retweet_count") AS Retweet_Count, get_json_object(public_metrics, "$.reply_count") AS Reply_Count, get_json_object(public_metrics, "$.like_count") AS Like_Count, get_json_object(public_metrics, "$.quote_count") AS Quote_Count, * FROM operator_runScript_1  ] as t1 | [ dropColumns(t1, "id", "other_field", "stdout", "stderr", "exit_code") ] as t2

templateNodes.name: Format_Output
templateNodes.templateLQL:
`select 
regexp_replace(text, '"','') as Tweet,
Retweet_Count,
Like_Count,
Reply_Count,
Quote_Count,
regexp_replace(name, '"','') as Real_Name, 
regexp_replace(username, '"','') as UserName

from operator_runScript_2`

inputs.description: Parent 0
inputs.label: Parent 0

integrations.name: Web API
integrations.description: Web API integration allows you to execute any Web API and retrieve results.

steps.name: web_api Authentication Information
steps.description: Enter authentication information for the web_api integration

inputs.description: Label for this integration instance.
inputs.label: Label

inputs.description: Define variables here to templatize integration connections and actions. For example, you can use https://www.{{hostname}}.com, where hostname is a variable defined in this input.
inputs.label: Reference Values

inputs.description: Select option to verify connecting server's SSL certificate (Default is Verify SSL Certificate)
inputs.label: Verify SSL

inputs.description: Upload a .p12 Client Certificate file (p12 file at action input takes precedence over connection)
inputs.label: Client Certificate

inputs.description: Enter password to read the client certificate
inputs.label: Client Certificate Password

actions.name: Execute Web API
actions.description: Execute given Web API and return the response

inputs.description: Request type to get the method name
inputs.label: Request type

inputs.description: Url Endpoint
inputs.label: URL

inputs.description: Web api request headers
inputs.label: Headers

inputs.description: Web api request parameters
inputs.label: Params

inputs.description: Web api request body
inputs.label: Body

inputs.description: Username for request
inputs.label: Username

inputs.description: Password for request
inputs.label: Password

inputs.description: Upload a .p12 Client Certificate file (p12 file at action input takes precedence over connection)
inputs.label: Client Certificate

inputs.description: Enter password to read the client certificate
inputs.label: Client Certificate Password

inputs.description: Select how to parse the response based on its expected format. (Default is "Raw" and will pass the full body to the response field). `File` will write the response to a file and return the file-id.
inputs.label: Expected Response Format

inputs.description: If server response is parsed as a list of values instead of a single value, return as individual rows for each value (Default is False)
inputs.label: Explode Results

inputs.description: Time to wait between consecutive API requests in milliseconds (Default is 0 millisecond)
inputs.label: Time between consecutive API requests (in millis)

inputs.description: Timeout in seconds (Default is 360 seconds)
inputs.label: Action Timeout

inputs.description: Number of rows to read from parent table
inputs.label: Rows to Process

inputs.description: Count of threads to use for processing rows of input table (Default is 1 thread)
inputs.label: Count of threads

failedAttempt.errorMessage: This imported connection is using a different version of the Web API (logichub.web_api) integration than what is currently available on this deployment. Please edit the connection to ensure it works correctly.
